alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wakulla, Gadsden, eastern Liberty, Jefferson, Leon, southeastern Decatur, Grady, Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms behind a thunderstorm gust front extending from Ochlocknee to 7 miles northeast of Havana to 9 miles west of Greensboro. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Thomasville, Quincy, Havana, Midway, Florida A and M, Cairo, Crawfordville, Boston, Ochlocknee, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Gretna and Attapulgus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
